divs: Sighting Detailsa few guest from out of town and i were sitting in my back yard talking. i looked up and it was a big fire ball but it had a oval shape plus the speed it was going i ruled out meteor or comet. I also ruled out a plane as well due to it looked like it was on fire the light continued to flicker. a few seconds after that there was another one at a distance ( if i were to guesstimate the distance between one and the other i would say half of mile) also the same thing same description as the first.... i took photographs but very blurry due to not the highest resolution and the distance between us and the ufo were farther then my camera can zoom to. My friends and family all viewed this and in amazed of this.... this lasted a little over 5 minutes.. i advised this a friend who is also believer of UFO...the direction from to... they came from 192 degrees south tours 327 degrees NW. my feelings were excitement, wow i cant really explain it. lost sight when they both disappear
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Kendall
There were no other sightings in Kendall on or around January 1st 2013
Summary: was very at least a little slower then a plane. it was 2 of the same figuer flame like
